sentences.en: And so on , a regular , rhythmical way , while the four little heaps gradually grew and grew.
sentences.cn: 等等, 等等,说得有板有眼, 那四小堆就越长越高了.

sentences.en: Good breathing is slow, rhythmic and deep.
sentences.cn: 良好的呼吸缓慢、有节奏并且深沉。
他的呼吸变得更有节奏了.

sentences.en: Its stimulating rhythmical style is full of life.
sentences.cn: 逗趣对答式的乐汇极富生活气息.

sentences.en: Rhythmical prose marked by parallelism and ornateness were no longer popular in later ages.
sentences.cn: “四六体”的文章在后世已经不再流行了.

sentences.en: Some societies express strong feelings by means of collective rhythmical body movements.
sentences.cn: 有些群体的人通过集体有节奏的身体动作来表达强烈的感情.

sentences.en: The rhythmical roar of the breakers sounded like a symphony.
sentences.cn: 击岸浪有节奏的汹涌澎湃的声音,听起来象一首交响乐.

sentences.en: The understated melody, the fluid rhythmical meter, the ingenious subtlety, together with random orchestration.
sentences.cn: 乐曲通过委婉的曲调, 流畅的节奏韵律, 巧妙细腻 、 配合错落的配器.

sentences.en: This study was designed to investigate adenosine A 1 receptors could modulate primary rhythmical respiration in mammals.
sentences.cn: 实验旨在探讨腺苷A1受体在对基本呼吸节律调制中的可能作用.

words.tran_cn: [生物] 有节奏的（等于rhythmical）；间歇的；合拍的
使押韵；用韵诗表达；把…写作诗

trans.tran_cn: 有节奏的，有韵律的，有节律的，按节拍的
trans.tran_en: A rhythmic movement or sound is repeated at regular intervals, forming a regular pattern or beat
